title: BRIEF-Todd River Resources Purchases Option Over Prospective Nickel Project
text:
BRIEF-Todd River Resources Purchases Option Over Prospective Nickel Project

Commodities 1 hour ago (Oct 04, 2019 09:20)

BRIEF-Todd River Resources Purchases Option Over Prospective Nickel Project Oct 4 (Reuters) - Todd River Resources Ltd : * TODD RIVER ACQUIRES RIGHTS TO PROMISING NEW NICKEL SULPHIDE EXPLORATION TERRAIN AT NANUTARRA NICKEL PROJECT * AGREEMENT ALSO PROVIDES FOR A POTENTIAL MINING JOINT VENTURE TO BE FORMED ONCE TRM HAS ACQUIRED AN 80% INTEREST IN TENEMENT

BRIEF-Todd River Resources Purchases Option Over Prospective Nickel Project
description: BRIEF-Todd River Resources Purchases Option Over Prospective Nickel Project
